title: Computer Simulation
description: Algorithms and techniques for creating computer simulations and their realization in software.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 2028 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1372 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2316 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CX 4010 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2036 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
